text: "Stardust" is an American popular song It was composed in 1927 by Hoagy Carmichael. In 1929, Mitchell Parish added lyrics. At first, the song was called "Star Dust". Carmichael was the first person to record the song. He recorded it at the Gennett Records studio in Richmond, Indiana. The song is "a song about a song about love".Sudhalter, Richard M. (2003). Stardust Melody: The Life and Music of Hoagy Carmichael. Oxford University Press. . Many musicians recorded this song. Artie Shaw recorded it with his big band. ==References== ==Other websites== *Stardust on Sold on Song (BBC) * Category:1927 songs Category:1927 works Category:Louis Armstrong songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Eddie Cochran songs Category:Nat King Cole songs Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs
title: Stardust (song)
